step1.sentence: My grandmother truly has a heart of gold — she spends every weekend cooking meals for elderly neighbors who live alone.

step2.story: When the new intern spilled coffee all over the shared documents, everyone expected the manager to be furious. Instead, she helped clean up the mess and told him not to worry, sharing a story about her own first-day disaster. Everyone in the office agreed she truly has a heart of gold.

step3.story: Jimin had been volunteering at the local shelter for three years without telling anyone. One rainy evening, a journalist visited the shelter and noticed him quietly serving dinner to dozens of people. She asked why he came every single night after his long shifts at the factory. Jimin simply shrugged and said someone had to do it. The journalist wrote an article titled 'The Man with a Heart of Gold,' and suddenly the whole town knew his secret. Jimin was embarrassed by the attention, but donations to the shelter tripled overnight.

meaning.literalMeaningKo: 금으로 된 심장을 가지고 있다는 뜻입니다.
meaning.realUsageKo: 매우 친절하고 너그러운 성격을 가진 사람을 묘사할 때 사용합니다. 겉으로는 무뚝뚝해 보여도 속이 따뜻한 사람에게도 자주 쓰입니다.
meaning.etymologyKo: 금(gold)은 오래전부터 순수함과 가치의 상징이었습니다. 셰익스피어의 작품에서도 비슷한 표현이 등장하며, 마음이 금처럼 순수하고 귀하다는 의미에서 유래했습니다.
meaning.nuanceKo: 항상 긍정적인 칭찬으로 사용되며, 특히 남을 돕는 행동을 꾸준히 하는 사람에게 씁니다. 격식/비격식 모두 자연스럽게 쓸 수 있는 표현입니다.
meaning.shortExampleEn: Don't let his tough exterior fool you — he has a heart of gold.
meaning.shortExampleKo: 그의 무뚝뚝한 겉모습에 속지 마세요 — 그는 마음이 정말 따뜻한 사람이에요.
